TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PolicyLevel extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents the security policy levels for the common language runtime.

span.span: Represents the security policy levels for the common language runtime.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，common language runtime (CLR) 是移動離開電腦提供安全性原則。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the common language runtime (CLR) is moving away from providing security policy for computers. 我們建議您改用[Windows 軟體限制原則 (SRP)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178101)或是[AppLocker](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178102) CLR 安全性原則來取代。We recommend that you use [Windows Software Restriction Policies (SRP)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178101) or [AppLocker](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178102) as a replacement for CLR security policy. 本主題資訊適用於.NET framework 3.5 及更早版本;不適用於[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]和更新版本。The information in this topic applies to the .NET Framework version 3.5 and earlier; it does not apply to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] and later. 如需這個及其他變更的詳細資訊，請參閱[安全性變更](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For more information about this and other changes, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md). 最高層級的安全性原則是全企業。The highest level of security policy is enterprise-wide. 後續的較低層級，階層的進一步代表原則限制，但可以永遠不會授與超過允許的更高層級的權限。Successive lower levels of hierarchy represent further policy restrictions, but can never grant more permissions than allowed by higher levels. 會實作下列原則層級：The following policy levels are implemented: 1. Enterprise： 在企業中的所有 managed 程式碼的安全性原則。Enterprise: Security policy for all managed code in an enterprise. 2. 在電腦上執行的所有 managed 程式碼的電腦： 安全性原則。Machine: Security policy for all managed code run on the computer. 3. 在使用者執行的所有 managed 程式碼的使用者： 安全性原則。User: Security policy for all managed code run by the user. 4. 應用程式定義域： 應用程式中的所有 managed 程式碼的安全性原則。Application domain: Security policy for all managed code in an application. 原則層級所組成的一組組織成單一的根樹狀結構的程式碼群組 (請參閱)、 一組具名使用權限集合所參考的指定權限授與屬於程式碼群組的程式碼的程式碼群組，以及一份完全信任組件。A policy level consists of a set of code groups organized into a single rooted tree (see ), a set of named permission sets that are referenced by the code groups to specify permissions to be granted to code belonging to the code group, and a list of fully-trusted assemblies. 使用列舉的原則層級。Use to enumerate the policy levels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立新與"AppDomain"。This method creates a new with the "AppDomain". 新一開始會包含相同物件，例如，預設的電腦原則和將具有單一根程式碼群組可授與`FullTrust`所有程式碼。The new will initially contain the same objects as in the default computer policy, and will have a single root code group that grants `FullTrust` to all code.

span.span: A list of objects used to determine whether an assembly is a member of the group of assemblies used to evaluate security policy.

value.span: 不在清單中的組件的安全性原則評估期間，這些組件都會授予完全信任。

span.span: These assemblies are granted full trust during security policy evaluation of assemblies not in the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會授與的完全信任的組件的安全性原則評估期間不在清單中，但不是會自動授與完全信任時直接的安全性原則系統所評估。 are granted full trust during security policy evaluation of assemblies not in the list, but are not automatically granted full trust when directly evaluated by the security policy system. 因為這些版本中未使用的完全信任組件清單，在 2.0 版或更新版本的.NET Framework 不支援屬性。The property is not supported in version 2.0 or later of the .NET Framework because the list of full trust assemblies is not used in those versions.

summary.span: Replaces the configuration file for this with the last backup (reflecting the state of policy prior to the last time it was saved) and returns it to the state of the last save.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會修改目前。This method does not make modifications to the current . 相反地，它會更新物件的檔案和安全性系統用來評估原則。Instead, it updates the object's file and the that the security system uses to evaluate policy. 這個方法由 caspol-復原選項 (請參閱[Caspol.exe （程式碼存取安全性原則工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md))。This method is used by the caspol -recover option (see [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The used to resolve the .

summary.span: Resolves policy based on evidence for the policy level, and returns the resulting .

span.span: Resolves policy based on evidence for the policy level, and returns the resulting .
The resulting .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為原則層級的基本原則評估作業。 is the basic policy evaluation operation for policy levels. 提供一組做為輸入的辨識項，這個方法會測試從根目錄開始，並以比對，向下運作的程式碼群組的成員資格條件。Given a set of evidence as input, this method tests membership conditions of code groups starting at the root and working down as matched. 合併的相符程式碼所產生的權限群組，便會產生所傳回。The combination of permissions resulting from the matching code groups produces a that is returned. 在程式碼的權限授與，安全性原則會使用所有適用的原則層級，以及權限的程式碼要求解析過的原則陳述式。In granting permissions to code, security policy uses the resolved policy statements for all applicable policy levels, together with the code request for permissions. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用方法。The following code shows the use of the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[system.Security.policy.policylevel#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.policy.policylevel/CPP/policylevel.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[system.Security.policy.policylevel#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.policy.policylevel/CS/policylevel.cs#13)] [!code-vb[system.Security.policy.policylevel#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.policy.policylevel/VB/policylevel.vb#13)]

exception.span: The policy level contains multiple matching code groups marked as exclusive.

span.span: The policy level contains multiple matching code groups marked as exclusive.

exception.span: The parameter is .

span.span: The parameter is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The used to resolve policy.

summary.span: Resolves policy at the policy level and returns the root of a code group tree that matches the evidence.

span.span: Resolves policy at the policy level and returns the root of a code group tree that matches the evidence.

returns.span: A representing the root of a tree of code groups matching the specified evidence.

span.span: A representing the root of a tree of code groups matching the specified evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法，以分析一組特定的辨識項相關的原則層級中的程式碼群組的效果。You can use this method to analyze the effect of the code groups in a policy level with respect to a certain set of evidence. 比方說，如果安全性原則無法授與組件需要的最小的程式碼要求權限，很難分辨所檢查的確實問題所在的程式碼群組。For example, if the security policy is not granting an assembly the minimum code request permissions it needs, it can be difficult to tell by examination of the code groups exactly where the problem is. 由於這個方法會傳回可以有子程式碼群組的程式碼群組，就可以讓系統管理員檢查程式碼群組和它的子程式碼群組，並判斷哪些程式碼群組的相符項目。Since this method returns a code group that can have child code groups, it is possible for an administrator to examine the code group and its child code groups and determine which code groups match.

exception.span: The policy level contains multiple matching code groups marked as exclusive.

span.span: The policy level contains multiple matching code groups marked as exclusive.

exception.span: The parameter is .

span.span: The parameter is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最高層級的安全性原則是全企業。The highest level of security policy is enterprise-wide. 後續的較低層級，階層的進一步代表原則限制，但可以永遠不會授與超過允許的更高層級的權限。Successive lower levels of hierarchy represent further policy restrictions, but can never grant more permissions than allowed by higher levels. 原則層級，依序如下所示。The policy levels in order are the following. 1. 企業Enterprise 2. 機器Machine 3. 使用者User 4. 應用程式定義域Application domain 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .
